title: Sangatsu wa Oresama ni Narimasu
original_name: 三月は俺様になります
sinopse:
Sumire Sangatsu is a high school girl with no confidence and she can't confess her feeling to a boy she's in love. One day, she finds Nanami who's just overflows with confidence, and decides to be his apprentice.

Everyone has their way, but is it all right!?

(Source: MU)
